description:
Bring your laptop to the pub and work on whatever Clojure project you like in the company of like-minded people.

This week we'll also discuss how we can organise a ClojureBridge event in the upcoming months, so come along if you're interested in helping out with that.

location.address: 31/32 King Street, The Beermuda Triangle, BS1 4DZ
location.name: Small Bar

title: Programming in the Pub and ClojureBridge discussion
